item.title: IRC meeting summary for 2016-05-26
item.description:
IRC meeting summary for 2016-05-26

Developers are working on a soft fork to introduce segregated witness onto Bitcoin mainnet. Segregated witness (segwit) allows transaction signature data to be stored outside of the data hashed to produce transaction identifiers, removing all known forms of third-party malleability, allowing full nodes to compile the current UTXO set without downloading all signatures, and laying the groundwork for fraud proofs that can allow lightweight (SPV) clients to help enforce more of the consensus rules.

item.title: Swedbank Creates Digital Banking Conglomerate
item.description:
Swedbank Creates Digital Banking Conglomerate

After the growing number of blockchain consortiums, some institutions have taken it upon themselves to create a digital banking group. Swedbank is leading the charge in this regard, as they want to try and tackle the mobile sector. It comes as no surprise to find out is looking to partner with other financial institutions and even fintech players in the coming months.

item.title: What Is Bitcoin? 5 Things You Need to Know
item.description:
What Is Bitcoin? 5 Things You Need to Know

Bitcoin, the world's most popular digital currency, has been on a tear in 2016, up 32% since the markets bottomed in mid-January. But what is bitcoin? Should investors jump on board? Before you start investing in bitcoins and counting your profits, it's important to know what you're getting yourself into-just like you would with any currency or equity.

item.title: LISK Technical Analysis for 05/30/2016 - Pivot Level Overview
item.description:
LISK Technical Analysis for 05/30/2016 - Pivot Level Overview

While the Lisk digital token has only been trading for about seven days on the Delaware-based digital currency exchange Poloniex, the Lisk charts show some distinct price level that may be of interest to investors and speculators.

item.title: Tmall Forced To Immediately Halt Over-the-counter Drugs Sales
item.description:
Tmall Forced To Immediately Halt Over-the-counter Drugs Sales

The Alibaba company runs various online commerce platforms, including Tmall. However, the group has demanded vendors stop offering medicine on the platform, as part of a new directive. Albeit these products seem to be genuine, online platforms have to help their drug sales immediately.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Nears $550
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Nears $550

Bitcoin price achieved a new high at $540 (Bitstamp) and 4000 CNY. The $550 resistance level remains untouched and should still be on the cards if the market can maintain momentum. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here. Not a member?
